meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Bizal AJ Freeman Lisa Mueller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7722.

td.p: John Bizal, a retired high school English teacher from Scottsdale, Arizona
AJ Freeman, a customer solutions advisor from Boise, Idaho
Lisa Mueller, a technical services librarian from Naperville, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,800)

tr.td: GEEK CONFUSION
BROTHERHOODS
THE START OF AN "ART"
THE MOST EXCITING PLAY
INSIDE THE PARK
HOME RUN

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: It was a naval battle, obviously.)
...

AJWhat is Rome?
$7,000
LisaWhat is Battle of Actium?
$2,200
JohnWhat is Salerno?
$6,001
the Battle of Actium')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Of this battle in 31 B.C., Virgil wrote, "Neptune\'s fields grow red with fresh slaughter"')

tr.td: ROMAN HISTORY
Of this battle in 31 B.C., Virgil wrote, "Neptune's fields grow red with fresh slaughter"
Lisa
AJ
John
2-day champion: $33,200
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Lisa
AJ
John

18 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

20 R
(including 2 DDs),
3 W
